title: Promoting Costa Rica at the World Medical Tourism & Global Healthcare Congress
text: RSS Feeds: Promoting Costa Rica at the World Medical Tourism & Global Healthcare Congress Costa Rica is an increasingly popular healthcare destination for those seeking prompt, professional and price-favorable procedures. In fact, Costa Rica was the 3rd most popular location for U.S. medical tourists in 2014. San José, Costa Rica, September 24, 2015 --( PR.com )-- September 27-30, 2015, the Orange County Convention Center, Orlando, will host the event of the year in The Medical Tourism Industry.The Medical Tourism Association will facilitate the World Medical Tourism & Global Healthcare Congress, alongside the Employee Healthcare & Benefits Congress. These events allow anyone who is anyone in Medical Tourism to connect with companies, insurance groups and medical tourism facilitators seeking an alternative solution to the rising healthcare costs in the United States of America. Allowing attendees immediate access to top quality healthcare elsewhere, instead of the growing wait lines in the US and Canada.Sometimes you just can’t wait for that Full Knee Replacement, or cannot afford it in your home country. Sometimes you know that Bariatric Surgery will dramatically improve your quality of life, though you don’t want to spend your life savings paying for it. Sometimes you dream of a healthy, happy smile, but don’t want to bite into your pension to achieve it.Costa Rica is an increasingly popular healthcare destination for those seeking prompt, professional and price-favorable procedures. In fact, Costa Rica was the 3rd most popular location for US medical tourists in 2014.The Congress promises to be the World’s Largest Medical Tourism Event with up to 3,000 participants from all over the world, coming together to learn, meet and share opportunities and solutions for Medical Tourism worldwide.MediTourDirect S.A. are proud to be promoting Costa Rica’s original Medical Tourism Directory Costa Rica for their third consecutive year at this event.Medical Tourism Directory Costa Rica, connects users worldwide with the very best healthcare and travel providers in Costa Rica, via their easy-to-use websites, packed with photos, information and user testimonials.MediTourDirect will connect with medical tourism facilitators from many countries wishing to send their clients to Costa Rica, offering expert advice on how to best serve their patients in Costa Rica.MediTourDirect also offers a Corporate Assistance program, helping self-funded companies and insurance groups connect directly with quality providers, to offer the best quality healthcare at a much reduced cost for all involved and in a paradisiacal location.To connect with MediTourDirect Costa Rica at this event or at any time, just call 1-888-743-3201 or visit www.medicaltourismcostarica.com Contact Information
